price: 3 Il t’a révélé le Livre de vérité confirmant les Ecritures qui l’ont précédé, de même qu’Il a révélé la Torah et l’Evangile
arabic: نَزَّلَ عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَأَنزَلَ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: nazzala ʿalayka al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi muṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayhi wa-anzala al-tawrāta wal-injīla
